      • expand

        public Matrix expand(int row,
                     int col)
              throws IllegalMatrixSizeException
        Description copied from interface: Matrix
        Increases or decreases the size of the matrix by a specified amount of rows or columns. When size is being increased, all the new rows and columns are filled with zero.
        Specified by:
        expand in interface Matrix
        Parameters:
        row - the amount of rows to expand by
        col - the amount of columns to expand by
        Returns:
        itself
        Throws:
        IllegalMatrixSizeException - if the matrix shrinks to a size smaller than 1x1
